name: Apple
description: Designs and manufactures consumer electronics, computer software, and online services.

name: Microsoft
description: Develops, licenses, and sells computer software, consumer electronics, and personal computers.

name: Amazon
description: Multinational technology and e-commerce company focusing on cloud computing, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence.

name: Google
description: Specializes in Internet-related services and products, including online advertising technologies, a search engine, cloud computing, and software.

name: Facebook
description: Social media and technology company offering social networking services.

name: Tesla
description: Electric vehicle and clean energy company known for its electric cars, energy storage, and solar products.

name: IBM
description: Multinational technology and consulting company offering hardware, software, and hosting services.
